# Agent Artifacts — llms.txt
# Machine-readable product index for LLM agents and crawlers
# Site: https://agentassets.io
# Updated: 2026-02-26
# Total: 184 products, 8 bundles

## About
Agent Artifacts is a digital download store selling production-ready AI prompts, skill modules, agents, utilities, and documentation.
All products are delivered as Markdown and JSON files with instant digital delivery after Stripe checkout.
Free samples available for most lead_magnet products — see sample_link on each listing.

## Base URL
https://agentassets.io

## API
- Machine-readable catalog JSON: https://agentassets.io/api/catalog
- Sitemap: https://agentassets.io/sitemap.xml

## Categories
- prompt: Ready-to-use prompt packs and chains — ideal for Claude, GPT-4, Cursor
- skill: Skill MD modules with schemas and error handling — drop into any agent framework
- agent: Full packaged agents with configs, manifests, and docs
- utility: JSON schemas, guardrails YAML, and OpenAPI wrapper templates
- doc: Playbooks, cookbooks, and compatibility guides for AI builders
- bundle: Curated product bundles at discounted prices

## Free Samples
Products marked [FREE SAMPLE] include a preview you can download before purchasing.
Free Library: https://agentassets.io/free-library

## Compatibility
Products are compatible with: OpenAI API, Anthropic Claude, Cursor, LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen, OpenAPI

## Licensing
All products are licensed for commercial single-seat use. Redistribution and resale of raw files is not permitted.
